result.arabic_text: وَأُوحِيَ إِلَىٰ نُوحٍ أَنَّهُۥ لَن يُؤۡمِنَ مِن قَوۡمِكَ إِلَّا مَن قَدۡ ءَامَنَ فَلَا تَبۡتَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
result.translation: It was revealed to Noah, “None of your people will ever believe except those who have already believed. So do not grieve over what they do[16].
result.footnotes: [16] i.e., rejecting the message and mockery.
